text: Clay, 30 / / Chicago / / Occupation : Former NFL player / / The lowdown : Editors won't have to bleep the former tight end for the New Orleans Saints. He doesn't even curse. ( Photo : Paul HebertABC ) Former Missouri State tight end Clay Harbor had a few tough breaks during Monday night's episode of ` ` The Bachelorette.'' When the contestants took to the football field during a group date to impress Bachelorette Becca Kufrin, one might have thought it was Harbor's time to shine. But when it was crunch time on the gridiron, things went from good to bad to worse for our local heartthrob. Who is Clay Harbor : Former MSU coach weighs in on tight end now on'The
